column9: 1934 to the late maston and matilda green mullins. in addition to his parents
column10: mr. mullins was preceded in death by a daughter
column13: lacy and raymond mullins. he was a loving husband
column14: father and grandfather. he took great pride in his craft as an electrician and served as a member of the international brotherhood of electrical workers union #342. mr. mullins is survived by his wife of 52 years
column15: alma ""pat"" foley mullins of the home; two daughters and a son-in-law

column19: little girl and big girl. a graveside service will be held saturday
column21: 2015 at 3:30 p. m. in the stateline cemetery with pastor gene pearson officiating. the family will receive friends on saturday from 2:00 p. m. to 3:00 p. m. at moody funeral home in stuart and at other times at the home. online condolences may be sent by visiting www. moodyfuneralservices. com.
